::Epyon::

He turns to Iron Raptor.
"If we end up needing to pull out, my base is fully functional, and will
be able to hold us."

::Hot Rod::

With this confrontation with Dark Pri... no, Optimus Prime over, he
transformes to car mode and heads back to the CF.

::Demolition::

He still followed Unitron and the others around, looking for the place
that will be best to destroy the CF.

::DrillBit::

He transformed back to bot mode, and walked to Killfest and Dark Fate.
"Scorponok and the ladies had a run in with a Alliance bot. But its
taken care of, and he proceding to the base."

::Dollen::

It was hard to get into the tunnel with his wounds. He barely made it in
before it was closed off. He walked besides Dark Mouse.
